trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There was one other sighting in Kansas City on or around October 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to work, it was dark at 6:20 in the morning. I noticed something in the sky that at first I thought was a airplane. but the closer that I got i noticed that it did not move. There were very bright lights on the bottom of the craft on each side. I watched it for about 5 min. As I drove off I turned around to see if it was still there and there was no sing of it or any other light in the sky.
